data.title: Viridien: Global Technology and HPC leader
data.meta_description: Viridien provides data, products and services in Earth science, data science, sensing and monitoring for a wide range of industries.
data.text:
See Things Differently

As an advanced technology, digital and Earth data company we have a unique perspective on our planet.

LEARN MORE

Q2 2024 Financial Results

July 30th, 2024

Viridien, formerly CGG, announced its second quarter 2024 financial results on Tuesday, July 30th.

VIEW PRESS RELEASE REGISTER FOR WEBCAST

Viridien Stories

Unique and personal perspectives from our diverse global team as they work towards solving some of the most complex challenges we face today. Learn how we collaborate with colleagues, customers and partners to help to realize a more sustainable future.

DISCOVER OUR STORIES

See Things Differently

Who We Are

At Viridien we have a unique perspective on our planet, combining human ingenuity, data and new technology to see things differently.

Markets

We have leading expertise in Earth science, data science, sensing, imaging and monitoring and a unique portfolio of data, services and solutions that supports our clients in resolving complex challenges across a range of industries.

Energy

Enabling the responsible development of energy resources for over 90 years, with Earth science insight across oil, gas, geothermal and renewable projects.

Read more

HPC

Customized solutions for AI, Science, Engineering and Digital Media backed by 70 years’ experience of pioneering HPC and scientific computing at scale.

Read more

Marine Logistics

Smarter and safer marine vessel and port operations with real-time asset management solutions and data-driven insights for the maritime sector.

Read more

Environmental

Unique environmental intelligence through Earth science and data science expertise, to address complex environmental challenges today and tomorrow.

Read more

Defense Infrastructure Monitoring Mining Carbon Storage

Sophie Zurquiyah interviewed by SEG about key trends in the oil and gas sector

Sophie Zurquiyah records SEG Seismic Soundoff podcast about the transformation of CGG into Viridien and gives her insights on key trends in the oil and gas sector. ...

Industry Article

High-frequency FWI Imaging: repurposing seismic data for imaging shallow hazards

We describe how FWI Imaging results from existing, raw, conventional 3D seismic data, can be used as a rapidly available 3D alternative to dedicated site surveys or supplementary dataset to help improve understanding of the shallow subsurface. ...

IMAGE 2024

Come talk with our experts at our new Viridien booth during IMAGE 2024 and learn about our latest geoscience and digital science developments. ...

FEATURED CONTENT

Viridien Embarking on Era as a Diversified Technology Leader

In this exclusive interview for AI and Technology Magazines, Agnès Boudot, EVP, HPC & Cloud Solutions, discusses her decades of HPC experience and how Viridien is collaborating with new clients to tailor and optimize their HPC and cloud environments.

Young Scientists Drive Innovation in Subsurface Imaging

Viridien’s unmatched imaging relies on innovative geoscience technologies and HPC, plus something equally as important — the technical excellence of our people.

Careers at Viridien

As an industry leader, our business spans the geoscience landscape and stretches across the globe. We work with our clients to develop intelligence that enables them to secure energy resources for the world in an efficient, safe and sustainable way.

Work with us
